entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Tadoussac
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:56 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.5°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 88 %

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
